children.label: Goal 1
children.name: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

children.label: Target 1.5
children.name: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters

children.label: Indicator 1.5.4 / 11.b.2 / 13.1.3
children.name: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies

children.label: Target 11.b
children.name: By 2020, substantially increase the number of cities and human settlements adopting and implementing integrated policies and plans towards inclusion, resource efficiency, mitigation and adaptation to climate change, resilience to disasters, and develop and implement, in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015-2030, holistic disaster risk management at all levels

children.label: Goal 9
children.name: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

children.label: Target 9.4
children.name: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

children.label: Goal 8
children.name: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

children.label: Target 8.4

children.label: Goal 7
children.name: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

children.label: Target 7.3
children.name: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

children.label: Target 7.2
children.name: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

children.label: Series EG_EGY_CLEAN

children.label: Target 17.6

children.label: Target 15.b
children.name: Mobilize significant resources from all sources and at all levels to finance sustainable forest management and provide adequate incentives to developing countries to advance such management, including for conservation and reforestation

children.label: Target 15.3

children.label: Indicator 15.3.1
children.name: Proportion of land that is degraded over total land area

children.label: Series AG_LND_DGRD
children.name: Proportion of land that is degraded over total land area (%)

children.label: Target 15.8

children.name: Number of countries that have adopted legislative, administrative and policy frameworks to ensure fair and equitable sharing of benefits

children.label: Series ER_CBD_ABSCLRHS
children.name: Countries that have legislative, administrative and policy framework or measures reported to the Access and Benefit-Sharing Clearing-House (1 = YES; 0 = NO)

children.label: Series ER_CBD_NAGOYA
children.name: Countries that are parties to the Nagoya Protocol (1 = YES; 0 = NO)

children.label: Series ER_CBD_ORSPGRFA
children.name: Countries that have legislative, administrative and policy framework or measures reported through the Online Reporting System on Compliance  of the International Treaty on Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture (PGRFA) (1 = YES; 0 = NO)

children.label: Series ER_CBD_PTYPGRFA
children.name: Countries that are contracting Parties to the International Treaty on Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture (PGRFA) (1 = YES; 0 = NO)

children.label: Series ER_CBD_SMTA
children.name: Total reported number of Standard Material Transfer Agreements (SMTAs) transferring plant genetic resources for food and agriculture to the country (number)

children.label: Target 15.7
children.name: Take urgent action to end poaching and trafficking of protected species of flora and fauna and address both demand and supply of illegal wildlife products

children.label: Indicator 15.7.1 / 15.c.1
children.name: Proportion of traded wildlife that was poached or illicitly trafficked

children.label: Goal 3
children.name: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

children.label: Target 3.9
children.name: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

children.label: Indicator 3.9.1
children.name: Mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution

children.label: Series SH_AAP_ASMORT
children.name: Age-standardized mortality rate attributed to ambient air pollution (deaths per 100,000 population)

children.label: Series SH_AAP_MORT
children.name: Crude death rate attributed to ambient air pollution (deaths per 100,000 population)

children.label: Series SH_HAP_ASMORT
children.name: Age-standardized mortality rate attributed to household air pollution (deaths per 100,000 population)

children.label: Series SH_HAP_MORT
children.name: Crude death rate attributed to household air pollution (deaths per 100,000 population)

children.label: Series SH_STA_AIRP
children.name: Crude death rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution (deaths per 100,000 population)

children.label: Series SH_STA_ASAIRP
children.name: Age-standardized mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution (deaths per 100,000 population)

children.label: Goal 13
children.name: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

children.label: Target 13.b
children.name: Promote mechanisms for raising capacity for effective climate change-related planning and management in least developed countries and small island developing States, including focusing on women, youth and local and marginalized communities

children.label: Indicator 13.b.1
children.name: Number of least developed countries and small island developing States that are receiving specialized support, and amount of support, including finance, technology and capacity-building, for mechanisms for raising capacities for effective climate change-related planning and management, including focusing on women, youth and local and marginalized communities

children.label: Target 13.3
children.name: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning

children.label: Indicator 13.3.2
children.name: Number of countries that have communicated the strengthening of institutional, systemic and individual capacity-building to implement adaptation, mitigation and technology transfer, and development actions

children.label: Indicator 13.3.1
children.name: Number of countries that have integrated mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning into primary, secondary and tertiary curricula

children.label: Target 13.2
children.name: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

children.label: Indicator 13.2.1
children.name: Number of countries that have communicated the establishment or operationalization of an integrated policy/strategy/plan which increases their ability to adapt to the adverse impacts of climate change, and foster climate resilience and low greenhouse gas emissions development in a manner that does not threaten food production (including a national adaptation plan, nationally determined contribution, national communication, biennial update report or other)

children.label: Target 13.1
children.name: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries

children.label: Indicator 1.5.4 / 11.b.2 / 13.1.3
children.name: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies

children.label: Series SG_DSR_SILN
children.name: Number of local governments that adopt and implement local DRR strategies in line with national strategies (number)

children.label: Series SG_DSR_SILS
children.name: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies (%)

children.label: Series SG_GOV_LOGV
children.name: Number of local governments (number)

children.label: Indicator 1.5.3 / 11.b.1 / 13.1.2
children.name: Number of countries that adopt and implement national disaster risk reduction strategies in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015-2030

children.label: Series SG_DSR_LGRGSR
children.name: Score of adoption and implementation of national DRR strategies in line with the Sendai Framework

children.label: Indicator 1.5.1 / 11.5.1 / 13.1.1
children.name: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population

children.label: Series VC_DSR_AFFCT
children.name: Number of people affected by disaster (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_DAFF
children.name: Number of directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_DDHN
children.name: Number damaged dwellings attributed to disasters, by hazard type (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_DYHN
children.name: Number destroyed dwellings attributed to disasters, by hazard type (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_IJILN
children.name: Number of injured or ill people attributed to disasters (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_MISS
children.name: Number of missing persons due to disaster (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_MMHN
children.name: Number of deaths and missing persons attributed to disasters, by hazard type (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_MORT
children.name: Number of deaths due to disaster (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_MTMN
children.name: Number of deaths and missing persons attributed to disasters (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_MTMP
children.name: Number of deaths and missing persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_PDAN
children.name: Number of people whose damaged dwellings were attributed to disasters (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_PDLN
children.name: Number of people whose livelihoods were disrupted or destroyed, attributed to disasters (number)

children.label: Series VC_DSR_PDYN
children.name: Number of people whose destroyed dwellings were attributed to disasters (number)

children.label: Target 13.a
children.name: Implement the commitment undertaken by developed-country parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change to a goal of mobilizing jointly $100 billion annually by 2020 from all sources to address the needs of developing countries in the context of meaningful mitigation actions and transparency on implementation and fully operationalize the Green Climate Fund through its capitalization as soon as possible

children.label: Indicator 13.a.1
children.name: Mobilized amount of United States dollars per year between 2020 and 2025 accountable towards the $100 billion commitment
